name: iReTron
tag_list: sell, ecommerce, recommerce, ewaste, recycling, cell-phone, iphone, ipad, ebay
overview:
Get Cash for Your used Electronics at iReTron.com

Consumer electronics technology is moving so fast. Cell phone, digital camera, laptop… People are switching to new model even when the old ones are still useable. The e-Waste problem is getting more and more serious, even becomes a crisis.

iReTron.com, a Silicon Valley internet startup company was founded to help solve the crisis. They buy used electronics from individual customer, and offer different online quote based on the condition of them input by customer. If agreed with the offer, customer can ship the product to iReTron.com with a pre-paid shipping label. After iReTron received the device, they inspect it and then send out payment by check or Paypal payment in 2 days.

iReTron.com believes that reuse is the highest form of sustainability. Then fix used devices and bring them back into the market to keep working products in use as long as possible to extend their life. They are trying to offer an easy, fast, save and green way to turn old electronics devices into cash.

Right now they accept over 4000 types of gadgets in any condition including cell phones, mp3 players, e-Readers, tablets and calculators. In the near future, they’ll be expanding to include digital cameras, camcorders, GPS devices laptop and other electronics with the same green-minded focus of paying for used and broken gadgets that would otherwise end up as waste or in a drawer.
